title: User is not prompted when attempting to cancel changes on the Employee Roster Widget
custom_steps:
The user is currently not being prompted when attempting to cancel changes on the Employee Roster Widget.



Currently - When user is in edit mode, user is able to click on â€œCancel All changesâ€� without being prompted to confirm changes.

Expected - When user is in edit mode, user should be prompted to confirm that all changes should be canceled.

title: Missing Edit button on the footer of the Employee Roster Widget
custom_steps:
We are currently only able to edit the Employee Roster Widget through the pencil icon on the widget. We should have an edit button on the footer to allows us to edit the whole widget.

Currently - Each employee can be edited one by one using the pencil icon.

Expected - There should be an edit button on the footer of the widget that will allow us to make changes and put the widget into edit mode.

title: Auto-created Add Cs for next year do not show up on the player's Contract history widget and Add C widget
custom_steps:
When completing an outright transaction for a player, an Add C for next year is created. We should expect these to show up in the Contract History Widget and Add C widget.



+*Currently*+ - Auto-created Add Cs for the next year do not show up in the Contract History Widget. When the auto-created Add C is in the tendered state, it does not show up, but does show up when it is in the preliminary state.

+*Expected*+ - Auto-created Add Cs for the next year should show up in both Contract History and Add C widgets.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the "Foreign Opener" Special Roster To Allow Editing of Players
custom_steps:
Context: The Foreign Opener special roster needs to function similar to the Division Series special roster, where teams can edit the players being included.

AC:

* When the user selects an Org from the drop-down on the Foreign Opener special roster, the system will populate the 40-man roster
* There will be a trash can icon to remove players
* There will be an â€˜Add Playerâ€™ button to add players
** This will ad a row with a dropdown that contains all players in the Org

title: As a MNC Admin, I do not want Domestic Players to be labled as SFNY
custom_steps:
AC:

* If a Domestic player signs a First Year Domestic MNC for the next Calendar year, they will no longer be labeled as Signed For Next Year
* Their status will become Active and will begin counting against limits following existing logic

title: Update the Transaction->Injured/Inactive/Rehab screen to React
custom_steps:
Screen has three widgets on it:
Rehab

Players on Injured List

Players on Inactive List

title: Rework the multi add c printing from the widget to improve performance
custom_steps:
Users are unable to print Cs for 70 players (approx amount that will be on two DSL teams and need a C tendered for them) because of the screenshot timeout.

Looking a the process we are fetching each C in full and separately.  Instead we should be able to query for all the necessary data in one shot (its possible the old add C print is already doing this and has a query that can be repurposed).  That should greatly speed things up.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want a new 'Partner League' Minor Contract Type on the Pending Approvals Clipboard
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be a new â€˜Partner Leagueâ€™ Minor Contract Type added to the BOCâ€™s Pending Approvals Clipboard
* This type will be available in the â€˜Minor Contract Typeâ€™ filter
* The value will only appear in the filter, the Type result column will display the actual type of contract
* Selecting this value in the filter will return contracts for player that have been signed from a Partner League



Note: This is intended to function similar to the â€˜Recently Passed Overâ€™ filter

title: As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo via Text
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When a player memo is sent, EBIS will send the memo to all players via Text using the MLB Official Contact Info
 - Deliveries and failures will be logged and available for download
